description: Leo Varadkar says there is now "a window of opportunity" to hold the poll.
title: Irish general election to be held on 8 February
title_page: Irish general election to be held on 8 February - BBC News
maintext: "We have a deal on Brexit and Northern Ireland. Our economy has never been stronger; there are more people in work than ever before, incomes are rising, poverty is falling and the public finances are back in order," Mr Varadkar said, on the steps of Government Buildings in Dublin, on Tuesday.
